meanings: [Noun] Other things of the same sort or nature.

What emo punk kids say when there are standing around in groups admiring something. Playing pretend or trying to impress each other by coming up with new words. Your response of "on" means that something is giving you 100% satisfaction as opposed to the polar opposite 0%, which is off, just like ...

When the fate of something or someone has been determined and they are being watched. The predator's main thought is "SOON." The origin of this phrase is in an under-appreciated lolcat, where an evil-looking cat is watching a chihuahua, with the only caption being SOON. When pronounced, it helps ...

Describes something that we are told is coming soon (game updates, TV shows, etc.) but we have heard it enough times to know better. Whoever is saying x event will occur soon is considered to own the trademark on the word because they have used it so many times.

vlive.korean: 곧! 공개가 된다고 합니다! will be released soon! 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
[순둥도리 밥 줄려고요] 작은 냉장고? [I want to feed Soon, Doong and Dori] A small fridge? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [SKZ VLOG] 리노 : 리노, 하고 싶은 거 다 하지 마
vlive.english: [I want to feed Soon, Doong and Dori] A small fridge?

vlive.korean: 집에 들어오자마자 두두두두두두둑 그냥 막... 아주 그냥... And as soon as we got back, they kept talking non-stop... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MONSTA X] 겨드랑이가 있는데 왜 치지를 못하니.. 채씨의 <겨드랑이 치기 좋은 날>🐢 (Hyungwon's how to remove swelling out)
vlive.english: And as soon as we got back, they kept talking non-stop...

vlive.korean: 알겠습니다 웅이 씨도 조만간 V LIVE로 또 찾아올 거 아니에요? Okay! Isn't Woong going to come back with a V LIVE soon? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: Okay! Isn't Woong going to come back with a V LIVE soon?

vlive.korean: [속단은 금물] [하지만 바팩을 쉽게 보면 안 되는 이유!] [Too soon to make conclusions] [Why we shouldn't think of BOUNCE FACTORY as the underdog!] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 22. 서울대의 두 동아리 츄플 & 바팩 파이널에서 만나다!
vlive.english: [Too soon to make conclusions] [Why we shouldn't think of BOUNCE FACTORY as the underdog!]
